title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in Python, JavaScript, and cloud technologies. You will lead the development of our core platform, mentor junior developers, and architect scalable solutions. Required skills: Python, React, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines. Experience with machine learning is a plus.

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data science team to build predictive models and derive insights from large datasets. You'll work with cross-functional teams to implement ML solutions. Required: Python, SQL, Machine Learning, TensorFlow or PyTorch, Statistics. 3+ years of experience in data science or related field.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product strategy and roadmap for our SaaS platform. Work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams. Requirements: 4+ years PM experience, strong analytical skills, experience with agile methodologies, excellent communication skills. MBA preferred.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end features for our growing platform. We need someone comfortable with both frontend and backend development. Tech stack: Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, Redis, GraphQL. 2+ years of full-stack experience required.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Design and deploy ML models at scale. Work on NLP, computer vision, and recommendation systems. Required: Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, MLOps, AWS/GCP, 4+ years ML experience. PhD preferred but not required.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage and optimize our cloud infrastructure. Implement CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and security best practices. Required: AWS/Azure/GCP, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, Linux, Python/Bash scripting. 3+ years DevOps experience.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create beautiful, user-centered designs for web and mobile applications. Conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes. Required: Figma, Adobe XD, user research, prototyping, 3+ years design experience.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Build robust backend services for our financial platform. Focus on security, scalability, and reliability. Required: Java or Go, PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka, microservices architecture. 4+ years backend experience in fintech preferred.

title: Data Engineer
description: Design and maintain data pipelines and warehouses. Work with petabyte-scale data. Required: Python, SQL, Spark, Airflow, AWS/GCP, dbt. 3+ years data engineering experience.

title: Security Engineer
description: Protect our infrastructure and applications from security threats. Conduct penetration testing, security audits, and incident response. Required: Security certifications (CISSP, CEH), Python, cloud security, 5+ years security experience.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build responsive, accessible web applications with modern JavaScript frameworks. Required: React or Vue.js, TypeScript, CSS/SASS, testing frameworks, 2+ years frontend experience.

title: AI Research Scientist
description: Conduct cutting-edge AI research in areas like reinforcement learning, LLMs, and multimodal AI. Publish papers and transition research to products. Required: PhD in CS/ML, strong publication record, Python, PyTorch. 3+ years research experience.
